Item.comments: cFolder - sets defaults to allow_sub_folders and allowed_relaionships rules. - SQL
Item.method_code:
' Use Run Method action
' Data Administration tool Dim SQLstr As String = "" Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' select Sub cFolder relationship SQLstr = "UPDATE [cFolder] SET [cFolder].allow_sub_folders = '1'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE [cFolder].allow_sub_folders is Null" Dim res As Item = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return inn.newError(res.getErrorString())
' select Sub cFolder relationship SQLstr = "UPDATE [cFolder] SET [cFolder].allowed_relationships = 'attachments_and_controlled_items'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE [cFolder].allowed_relationships is Null" res = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return inn.newError(res.getErrorString())
Return inn.newResult("DONE")
Item.name: SYS_cFolder Admin Helper 03
